pullrequest.title: Send debug to log instead of console.

content.raw: That's fine. As an example, when launching the ROS PR2 gazebo worlds, there's a flood of warnings about extensions not converted. I'm still learning how to use extensions, but I assume that because these are debug messages, that they are just informational and harmless. Is that the case? If so, should that gzdbg in parser_urdf.cc be changed to gzlog?
content.html: That's fine. As an example, when launching the ROS PR2 gazebo worlds, there's a flood of warnings about extensions not converted. I'm still learning how to use extensions, but I assume that because these are debug messages, that they are just informational and harmless. Is that the case? If so, should that gzdbg in parser_urdf.cc be changed to gzlog?
